extendedInfo.description: Trick your friends into thinking you have the new Windows Phone 8 device. This app is replica of WP8 (not relased yet, don't mistake it with WP7) start screen. Remember this is not a launcher, but actually it can launch apps. Get newest Metro UI style on your phone - its free. Enjoy!Most icons will launch Android ready-set app, but if you want to change that press long on tile and choose your app. You can also change tile color in this way.It was tested on the latest 4.1 (Jelly Bean) system.-- Feedback --If you have problem, question or suggestion just let me know on: jakub.dyszkiewicz@gmail.com Just remember that I'm not able to answer your comment in Play Store-- Trademarks --Windows is trademark of Microsoft Corporation. This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft.-- Disclaimer --THIS IS NOT A VIRUS. This app does nothing harmful. Some antiviruses indetifies ads as virus. This app is supported via push notifications which can be easly deleted. This is the only way to provide app for 100% free. Thank you for understanding

reviews.title: Great but would b best as wallpaper
reviews.comment: Great app as i dont like launchers they use more battery. Love thi app cuz i like metro style. But this would b better as a responsive live wallpaper. Try that dev :)

reviews.title: Faster navigation
reviews.comment: With this simple and very well done application you can merge the advantages of Android and Windows Phone. I navigate much faster through my most used application instead of digging in the bunch of icons.  I\'d just suggest an option to toggle the Android top notification bar.  UPDATE: Removed from my phone and downgraded rating due to fake ads about being a winner of iPad. I\'m extremely intolerant to such craps!
reviews.author: Martin Lipocky
